New Words.句子: The waves tossed the boat around violently
New Words.中文: 波浪猛烈地把船搖來搖去。

New Words.句子: Let's toss a coin to decide
New Words.中文: 我們擲硬幣來決定吧。

New Words.句子: I'll toss you for the armchair
New Words.中文: 我來和你擲硬幣決定誰坐這張扶手椅。

New Words.句子: Toss the cooked vegetables in butter
New Words.中文: 把煮熟的蔬菜拌上黃油。

New Words.句子: He tossed about in his sleep all night
New Words.中文: 他整晚在睡夢中翻來覆去。

New Words.句子: He tossed out of the room in anger
New Words.中文: 他憤怒地衝出房間。

New Words.句子: The city attracts thousands of tourists every year with its historic landmarks
New Words.中文: 這座城市以其歷史地標每年吸引成千上萬的遊客。

New Words.句子: As a tourist, she enjoyed visiting local museums and tasting regional foods
New Words.中文: 作為一名遊客，她喜歡參觀當地的博物館並品嚐地區的美食。

New Words.句子: Many tourists were walking around the beach, taking pictures and enjoying the views
New Words.中文: 許多遊客在海灘上散步，拍照並享受美景。

New Words.句子: The tourist information center provides maps and guides to help visitors explore the area
New Words.中文: 旅遊資訊中心提供地圖和導覽，以幫助遊客探索該地區。

New Words.句子: She grabbed a towel to dry her hair after the shower
New Words.中文: 她洗完澡後拿起毛巾擦乾頭髮。

New Words.句子: The hotel provided fresh towels every day
New Words.中文: 酒店每天提供乾淨的毛巾。

New Words.句子: He wiped the table with a kitchen towel
New Words.中文: 他用廚房毛巾擦拭桌子。

New Words.句子: The beach towel was covered in sand after a day at the shore
New Words.中文: 海灘毛巾在一天的海邊活動後被沙子覆蓋。

New Words.句子: She toweled her face after washing it
New Words.中文: 她洗完臉後用毛巾擦乾。

New Words.句子: He toweled off quickly before getting dressed
New Words.中文: 他快速擦乾身體後才穿上衣服。

New Words.句子: The dog was toweled dry after its bath
New Words.中文: 狗洗完澡後被擦乾。

New Words.句子: The venom of some snakes contains powerful toxins
New Words.中文: 某些蛇的毒液含有強效的毒素。

New Words.句子: Certain bacteria release toxins that can cause food poisoning
New Words.中文: 某些細菌會釋放毒素，導致食物中毒。

New Words.句子: Scientists are studying ways to neutralize harmful toxins in the environment
New Words.中文: 科學家們正在研究中和環境中有害毒素的方法。

New Words.句子: Some toxins in polluted water can be dangerous to marine life
New Words.中文: 一些污染水中的毒素對海洋生物來說是危險的。

New Words.句子: Traditionalists argue that classic teaching methods are more effective than modern approaches
New Words.中文: (作為一位思想的雕塑家，她將抽象概念轉化為具體的形式)。

New Words.句子: Many traditionalists prefer handwritten letters over digital communication
New Words.中文: (許多傳統主義者更喜歡手寫信件勝過數位通訊)。

New Words.句子: The traditionalists in the community opposed the construction of a new shopping mall
New Words.中文: (社區中的傳統主義者反對建造新的購物中心)。

New Words.句子: Some traditionalists believe in preserving ancient rituals and ceremonies
New Words.中文: (一些傳統主義者認為應該保留古老的儀式和典禮)。

New Words.句子: The transmission of the message was delayed due to network issues
New Words.中文: 消息的傳遞因網絡問題而延遲。

New Words.句子: The flu virus spreads through airborne transmission
New Words.中文: The flu virus spreads through airborne transmission

New Words.句子: Radio transmission allows communication over long distances
New Words.中文: 無線電傳輸使得長距離通信成為可能。

New Words.句子: The car’s transmission needed repair after years of use
New Words.中文: 這輛車的變速器在多年使用後需要修理，導致換檔困難。

New Words.句子: Manual transmission requires the driver to shift gears manually
New Words.中文: 手動變速器需要駕駛員手動換檔。

New Words.句子: The mechanic checked the automatic transmission for any faults
New Words.中文: 技師檢查了自動變速器是否有任何故障。

New Words.句子: She carefully transplanted the seedlings to a sunnier part of the garden
New Words.中文: 她小心地將幼苗移植到花園中更陽光充足的地方。

New Words.句子: The patient received a bone marrow transplant from an anonymous donor
New Words.中文: 病人接受了來自匿名捐贈者的骨髓移植。

New Words.句子: She’s a Southern transplant now living in New York
New Words.中文: 她現在是個從南方搬來的移民，住在紐約。

New Words.句子: Many transplants find it difficult to adjust to a new culture and environment
New Words.中文: 許多移民發現很難適應新的文化和環境。

New Words.句子: The bush was transplanted to a different section of the yard
New Words.中文: 那株灌木被移植到院子的一個不同區域。

New Words.句子: Doctors transplanted one of his kidneys into his sister
New Words.中文: 醫生將他的其中一顆腎臟移植給了他的妹妹。

New Words.句子: The patient received a transplanted heart after waiting for several months
New Words.中文: 病人在等待了幾個月後，接受了移植的心臟。

New Words.句子: The group transplanted the beavers to a new habitat
New Words.中文: 該小組將海狸移植到了新的棲息地。

New Words.句子: She recently transplanted to the West Coast after living in New York for years
New Words.中文: 她最近從紐約搬到西海岸，開始了新的生活。

New Words.句子: The heart transplant was successful, and the patient is recovering
New Words.中文: 心臟移植手術成功，病人正在康復中。

New Words.句子: He is going to need a liver transplant to survive
New Words.中文: 他需要進行肝臟移植才能生存。

New Words.句子: Her body accepted the transplant without complications
New Words.中文: 她的身體順利接受了移植，沒有任何併發症。

New Words.句子: The peace treaty ended years of conflict between the two neighboring nations
New Words.中文: 和平條約結束了兩個鄰國之間多年的衝突。

New Words.句子: Several countries signed a treaty to reduce carbon emissions and combat climate change
New Words.中文: 幾個國家簽署了一項條約，以減少碳排放並對抗氣候變遷。

New Words.句子: The treaty established clear guidelines for trade between the two regions
New Words.中文: 該條約為兩個地區之間的貿易建立了明確的指導方針。

New Words.句子: A treaty is only as strong as the trust and commitment behind it.
New Words.中文: 條約的力量取決於背後的信任與承諾。

New Words.句子: The triadic color scheme used in the design created a balanced and vibrant look
New Words.中文: (設計中使用的三色配色方案創造了一個平衡且充滿活力的外觀)

New Words.句子: A triadic relationship involves three individuals interacting with each other
New Words.中文: (三方關係涉及三個個體彼此互動)

New Words.句子: The triadic structure of the musical composition gives it complexity and harmony
New Words.中文: (音樂作品的三重結構賦予了它複雜性和和諧感)

New Words.句子: The plane experienced severe turbulence during the flight
New Words.中文: 飛機在飛行途中遇到了強烈的亂流。

New Words.句子: The turbulence in the river made it dangerous for swimming
New Words.中文: 河水的湍流使游泳變得危險。

New Words.句子: The country faced political turbulence after the election results were announced
New Words.中文: 選舉結果公布後，該國面臨政治動盪。

New Words.句子: His life was marked by turbulence during the early years of his career
New Words.中文: 他的人生在職業生涯初期充滿了動盪。

New Words.句子: She decided to upcycle an old wooden chair by repainting it and adding new fabric
New Words.中文: (她決定通過重新塗漆和添加新布料來升級改造一把舊木椅)

New Words.句子: After the child outgrows the stroller, parents can upcycle it into a trolley, extending its use and functionality
New Words.中文: (在孩子長大不再使用嬰兒車後，父母可以將其升級改造成手推車，延長其使用壽命和功能性)

New Words.句子: By upcycling old clothes, the designer created a unique collection for the fashion show
New Words.中文: (通過升級改造舊衣服，設計師為時裝秀創建了一個獨特的系列)

New Words.句子: The snake's venom can be deadly if not treated quickly
New Words.中文: 如果未能及時治療，這條蛇的毒液可能是致命的。

New Words.句子: The spider's bite injected venom that caused severe pain
New Words.中文: 蜘蛛的咬傷注入了毒液，導致劇烈的疼痛。

New Words.句子: She spoke of him with venom in her voice
New Words.中文: 她提到他時，語氣中帶著毒辣。

New Words.句子: His words were filled with venom, reflecting his deep resentment
New Words.中文: 他的話語充滿毒辣，反映出他深深的怨恨。

New Words.句子: Venom isn’t evil; it’s simply nature’s way of survival.
New Words.中文: 毒液並不是邪惡，它只是大自然的一種生存方式。

New Words.句子: Even the deadliest venom plays a vital role in the balance of ecosystems.
New Words.中文: 即使是最致命的毒液，也在生態系統的平衡中扮演重要角色。

New Words.句子: The venomous snake can deliver a painful bite that requires immediate medical attention
New Words.中文: 毒蛇的咬傷會帶來劇痛，需要立即就醫。

New Words.句子: Some species of frogs are known for their brightly colored skin, which signals that they are venomous
New Words.中文: 某些蛙類以其鮮豔的皮膚而聞名，這表明它們有毒。

New Words.句子: Be careful around that spider; it’s known to be venomous and can cause serious harm
New Words.中文: 小心那隻蜘蛛；它以有毒聞名，可能造成嚴重傷害。

New Words.句子: The venomous jellyfish can paralyze its prey with its sting
New Words.中文: 毒水母的刺可以麻痺其獵物。

New Words.句子: The versatility of the new smartphone makes it useful for both work and entertainment
New Words.中文: (新款智能手機的多功能性使其適用於工作和娛樂)

New Words.句子: Her versatility as an actress allowed her to play both dramatic and comedic roles
New Words.中文: (她作為演員的多才多藝使她能夠同時扮演戲劇性和喜劇性的角色)

New Words.句子: The versatility of the fabric makes it perfect for a variety of clothing styles
New Words.中文: (這種面料的多功能性使其非常適合各種服裝風格)

New Words.句子: The tool’s versatility allows it to function as both a hammer and a screwdriver
New Words.中文: (這款工具的多功能性使其既能作為錘子又能作為螺絲刀使用)

New Words.句子: From the hilltop, we had a breathtaking view of the landscape, with rolling hills and a winding river below
New Words.中文: 從山頂上，我們俯瞰了令人嘆為觀止的景色，連綿的丘陵和蜿蜒的河流在下方。

New Words.句子: The hotel room offered a beautiful view of the landscape, stretching all the way to the ocean
New Words.中文: 酒店房間提供了美麗的景觀視野，一直延伸到海洋。

New Words.句子: The photographer captured a stunning view of the landscape during sunset, with vibrant colors filling the sky
New Words.中文: 攝影師在日落時捕捉到令人驚嘆的景觀視野，天空充滿了鮮豔的色彩。

New Words.句子: She wore a vintage-inspired dress that resembled 1950s fashion but was made with modern fabrics
New Words.中文: (她穿著一件復古風格的連衣裙，類似1950年代的時尚，但使用現代面料製作)

New Words.句子: The cafe had a vintage-inspired decor with antique furniture and classic wallpaper
New Words.中文: (這家咖啡館擁有復古風格的裝飾，配有古董傢俱和經典壁紙)

New Words.句子: His vintage-inspired watch had the look of a classic timepiece but featured advanced technology
New Words.中文: (他的復古風格手錶外觀像經典時計，但內置了先進技術)

New Words.句子: The designer created a vintage-inspired collection that blended retro patterns with contemporary tailoring
New Words.中文: (設計師創建了一個復古風格的系列，將復古圖案與現代裁剪相融合)

New Words.句子: The wear and tear on the old car's engine is becoming more noticeable after years of use
New Words.中文: (這輛舊車的引擎經過多年使用後，磨損越來越明顯)

New Words.句子: Apart from fair wear and tear, the bicycle is in excellent condition
New Words.中文: (除了正常的磨損外，這輛自行車的狀況極佳)

New Words.句子: The shoes were starting to show signs of wear and tear after several months of daily use
New Words.中文: (這雙鞋在幾個月的日常使用後開始出現磨損的跡象)

New Words.句子: Over the years, he had grown resilient to life's emotional wear and tear
New Words.中文: (多年來，他對生活中情感上的磨損變得更有韌性)

New Words.句子: His whisper was barely audible in the silent room
New Words.中文: 他的低語在寂靜的房間裡幾乎聽不見。

New Words.句子: The audience listened in a whisper as the suspense grew
New Words.中文: 隨著懸念加劇，觀眾低聲聆聽。

New Words.句子: A gentle whisper of the wind rustled through the trees
New Words.中文: 微風的輕聲低語在樹間沙沙作響。

New Words.句子: She leaned in to whisper a secret to her friend
New Words.中文: 她湊近對朋友低語一個秘密。

New Words.句子: He whispered instructions so no one else could hear
New Words.中文: 他低聲傳達指示，讓其他人聽不到。

New Words.句子: They whispered to avoid disturbing the other people in the library
New Words.中文: 他們低聲交談，以免打擾圖書館裡的其他人。

New Words.句子: Many people experience pain when their wisdom teeth begin to come in
New Words.中文: 許多人在智齒開始長出時會感到疼痛。

New Words.句子: The dentist recommended removing her wisdom teeth to prevent overcrowding
New Words.中文: 牙醫建議拔除她的智齒以防止牙齒擁擠。

New Words.句子: I'll act according as things turn out
She gave a vivid account of her travels through Europe, describing each city and its unique charms
She accounted for every penny spent on the project
Are you adequately prepared for the exam?
The living room was elegant, with tasteful adornments such as vases of fresh flowers and framed artwork
Is it right to attribute complex emotions to animals?
a bustling market / bustling streets
Is there a way to bypass the bridge construction?
a pair of calipers
The astronomers used powerful telescopes to study celestial bodies such as stars and galaxies
The late afternoon sunlight have the room a celestial glow
The painting depicted a serene landscape, with clouds resembling celestial staircase leading to heaven
In many myths and legends, celestial beings are described as guardians of the heavens, watching over the balance of the universe
Scientists have not reached a consensus on the cause of the disease
The construction site for the new shopping mall spans several acres.(佔地數英畝)
The research findings presented a contrary to the commonly held belief about the effectiveness of the medication
The company developed a new coating to protect against corrosion on its automotive parts
Have you no sense of decency?
Despite the rain, we went for a walk in the park.(最強烈堅定)
She went out for a walk, though it was raining.(中性口語)
The economic recession led to a divergence in career trajectories, with some individuals pursuing entrepreneurship while others sought stable employment in established companies
The company announced a quarterly dividend of $0.50 per share
One dollar is roughly the equivalent of 0.90 euros
Climbing the mountain without proper gear can be hazardous, leading to serious injury or even death
During the conversation, she hinted at her dissatisfaction with the current situation
The town was surrounded by hostile troops
The soldier faced hostile forces on the battlefield
The hostile remarks from her colleagues made it difficult for her to feel comfortable in the workplace
The decorator recommended a warmer hue of paint for the living room walls to create a cozy atmosphere
He hustled all day to finish the project before the deadline
The conflict was driven by differences in religious ideology between the two groups
Critics argue that the government's policies are ideologically motivated rather than based on practical considerations
His decision to drive without a seatbelt was completely idiotic
The plan was so poorly thought out that it seemed idiotic to everyone involved
The machine sat idle in the workshop because it was waiting for repair parts
She spent her idle hours reading books and gardening
His idle chatter during meetings was often distracting
The promise was considered idle talk since there were no plans to follow through
His idle threats were not taken seriously by his colleagues
Thousands of workers have been idled by the bad economy
The factory has been idled by the strike
She left the engine idling for a few seconds before she turned it off
They spent their vacation in an idyllic mountain village, surrounded by lush greenery and clear streams
After years of city living, she longed for the idyllic simplicity of countryside living
The children played idyllically in the meadow, their laughter echoing through the peaceful countryside
He used a match to ignite the pile of dry leaves in the backyard
The spark from the faulty wire caused the gasoline to ignite, resulting in a small explosion
The speaker's passionate words ignited a sense of purpose in the audience
Her innovative idea ignited a wave of excitement among her colleagues, leading to a productive brainstorming session
